Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PN8 (Plectasin D9N, M13G, Q14K, plectasin analog, synthetic AMPs, 3S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Amino acid substitution, fungal defensin analog, fungi-derived, natural derivatives

Literature.Author: Hao Y, Teng D, Mao R, Yang N, Wang J. 2023
Literature.Title: Site Mutation Improves the Expression and Antimicrobial Properties of Fungal Defense.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.5%) toPlectasinActivity: Active against S. aureus 43300 or E48 or 546 (MIC 4-16 ug/ml) but strain ATCC 25923>32 ug/ml.Recombinant production:yeast:Pichia pastoris: expressed and purified in a fermentor.
